message:
Hi Heather Cox Richardson — Billy HAO here, building **Fridge Channel (FC)**.

I put together a quick **“fridge edition” concept for Letters from an American**: https://FridgeChannels.com/@heathercoxrichardson

The idea: newsletters don’t lose readers because the content isn’t good — they lose them because **consumption drops** (“I’ll read later” → never), which hits **conversion + retention**.

FC adds a **household touchpoint** and turns each issue into a **1–2 min AI fridge edition**, then routes readers to the right next step (open full issue / subscribe when enabled).

Net effect: **Owned touchpoint → more full-issue opens → better retention → higher LTV.**

Open to a **12-min call**? https://calendly.com/billy-fridgechannels/30min (grab any slot that works).
